display_long_description:
In this chilling multiplayer horror game, you and your friends must work together to survive a series of increasingly challenging encounters with different types of terrifying chimps. Communicate seamlessly through voice chat as you navigate treacherous environments, solve puzzles, and fight for your lives against a variety of monstrous primate foes.
Key Features:
 * Chilling Encounters: Face off against a terrifying array of chimps, from agile and unpredictable attackers to hulking brutes with unnatural strength.
 * Cooperative Gameplay: Teamwork is essential for survival. Coordinate strategies, share resources, and support each other as you face overwhelming odds.
 * Voice Chat Integration: Seamlessly communicate with your friends using voice chat to plan your approach, warn of danger, and provide crucial support.
 * Customizable Experiences: Create and share your own unique challenges with the built-in level editor. Design terrifying encounters, set your own rules, and invite your friends to experience your creations.
 * Intense Storyline: Uncover the chilling secrets behind the chimp infestation in a gripping main storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
 * Immersive VR Experience: Feel the fear as you come face-to-face with your adversaries in stunning virtual reality environments.
Prepare to be terrified. Prepare to cooperate. Prepare to survive. Chimp Terror awaits.
